channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- MQ Appliance
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- MQ Appliance

item.title: CVE-2020-4375|2024-09-16T19:25:56.520Z -- ibm -- mq%20appliance
item.description: IBM MQ, IBM MQ Appliance, IBM MQ for HPE NonStop 8.0, 9.1 CD, and 9.1 LTS could allow an attacker to cause a denial of service due to a memory leak caused by an error creating a dynamic queue. IBM X-Force ID: 179080.

item.title: CVE-2019-4294|2024-09-16T18:34:28.475Z -- ibm -- mq%20appliance
item.description: IBM DataPower Gateway 2018.4.1.0 through 2018.4.1.6, 7.6.0.0 through 7.6.0.15 and IBM MQ Appliance 8.0.0.0 through 8.0.0.12, 9.1.0.0 through 9.1.0.2, and 9.1.1 through 9.1.2 could allow a local attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by a command injection vulnerability. IBM X-Force ID: 16188.

item.title: CVE-2022-22321|2024-09-16T18:03:45.740Z -- ibm -- mq%20appliance
item.description: IBM MQ Appliance 9.2 CD and 9.2 LTS local messaging users stored with a password hash that provides insufficient protection. IBM X-Force ID: 218368.

item.title: CVE-2021-39000|2024-09-16T16:13:28.214Z -- ibm -- mq%20appliance
item.description: IBM MQ Appliance 9.2 CD and 9.2 LTS could allow a local attacker to obtain sensitive information by inclusion of sensitive data within diagnostics. IBM X-Force ID: 213215.

item.title: CVE-2021-38958|2024-09-16T20:16:24.685Z -- ibm -- mq%20appliance
item.description: IBM MQ Appliance 9.2 CD and 9.2 LTS is affected by a denial of service attack caused by a concurrency issue. IBM X-Force ID: 212042

item.title: CVE-2018-1429|2024-09-16T18:55:24.166Z -- ibm -- mq%20appliance
item.description: IBM MQ Appliance 9.0.1, 9.0.2, 9.0.3, amd 9.0.4 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 139077.

item.title: CVE-2022-22316|2024-09-16T18:44:16.061Z -- ibm -- mq%20appliance
item.description: IBM MQ Appliance 9.2 CD and 9.2 LTS could allow an authenticated and authorized user to cause a denial of service due to incorrectly configured authorization checks. IBM X-Force ID: 218276.

item.title: CVE-2022-22356|2024-09-16T18:49:50.435Z -- ibm -- mq%20appliance
item.description: IBM MQ Appliance 9.2 CD and 9.2 LTS could allow an attacker to enumerate account credentials due to an observable discrepancy in valid and invalid login attempts. IBM X-Force ID: 220487.

item.title: CVE-2017-1318|2024-09-16T20:32:26.684Z -- ibm -- mq%20appliance
item.description: IBM MQ Appliance 8.0 and 9.0 could allow an authenticated messaging administrator to execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by command execution. IBM X-Force ID: 125730.

item.title: CVE-2024-25048|2024-06-04T17:35:01.063Z -- ibm -- mq%20appliance
item.description: IBM MQ Appliance 9.3 CD and LTS are vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking. A remote authenticated attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the server to crash. IBM X-Force ID: 283137.
